update_text: Version 1.5 is available for download, click here!
changelog_text: Changelog:                                                                                     • Added changelog.                                                                                            • Added startup animations for logo and hearts/stamina.                                                                                            • Made all items below hearts shift when hearts are only one line.                                                                                            • Fixed issue when free RAM is less than 1GB.                                                                                            • Fixed minor logo error.                                                                                            • Added Next tip fade animation.                                                                                            • Added feedback button in Options menu.                                                                                            • Item 8.                                                                                            • Item 9.                                                                                            • Item 10.                                                                                            • Item 11.                                                                                            • Item 12.                                                                                            • Item 13.                                                                                            • Item 14.                                                                                            • Item 15.                                                                                            • Item 16.
